attributes.action: Defer Easter & May Bank Holidays until Corona Virus restrictions are lifted.
attributes.additional_details: Just out of common sense and common courtesy really.
attributes.background: We’ve got 4 bank holidays coming up, all of which are almost certainly going to be at the height of the virus and thus useless to us all. Please could parliament defer these until later this year to make up for this period away from our families, friends and social activities.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/309243

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/
UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus

You can read NHS tips to help if you are worried about coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/oneyou/every-mind-matters/coronavirus-covid-19-anxiety-tips
